description: A bulwark of traditional local cuisine, this trattoria serves antipasti such as erbazzone (a savoury pie), fried gnocchi and cured ham, followed by fresh pasta (the cappelletti in broth are excellent), a choice of boiled and roast meat dishes, and a selection of desserts.
